questions.question_text:
Maximus Tech is a multinational company that uses Cisco ASA Firewalls for their systems. Jason is the one of the members of the team that checks the logs at Maximus Tech. As a part of his job, he is going through the logs and he came across a firewall log that looks like this:

May 06 2018 21:27:27 asa 1: % ASA -5 – 11008: User ‘enable_15’ executed the ‘configure term’ command

Based on the security level mentioned in the log, what did Jason understand about the description of this message?

comments.content:
Agreed ! Answer is C
ASA 2 - Critical Condition Message
ASA 5 - Normal but significant message

discussion.content:
Answer C: 
Asa - 5 - Notifications, normal but significant message.
cnd book page 2034

questions.question_text: In which of the following conditions does the system enter ROM monitor mode? Each correct answer represents a complete solution. Choose all that apply.

choices.A: The router does not have a configuration file.
choices.D: The router does not find a valid operating system image.
choices.B: There is a need to set operating parameters.
choices.C: The user interrupts the boot sequence.

questions.answer_description:
The system enters ROM monitor mode if the router does not find a valid operating system image, or if a user interrupts the boot sequence. From ROM monitor mode, a user can boot the device or perform diagnostic tests.
Answer option A is incorrect. If the router does not have a configuration file, it will automatically enter Setup mode when the user switches it on. Setup mode creates an initial configuration.
Answer option B is incorrect. Privileged EXEC is used for setting operating parameters.
